item.title: Climate and Weather
item.description: Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC) through the year in Europe. Data: E-OBS 18e. Probability of a frost day (minimum temperature less than 0ºC/32ºF) through the year in the Contiguous United States. Data: PRISM. Platform: Google Earth Engine. Concentration of daily precipitation in the contiguous United States 1981-2017. Data: PRISM. More details here. Average of Heating and Cooling Degree Days (1950-2018) in Spain.
